trans-unit.target: TEXT_AKTKMD105_04413_SEQ_00<tab>Alphinaud is determined to offer the villagers what succor he can.
TEXT_AKTKMD105_04413_TODO_00<tab>Speak with Matsya.
TEXT_AKTKMD105_04413_TODO_01<tab>Speak with Matsya again.
TEXT_AKTKMD105_04413_TODO_02<tab>Search for Qerasaf.
TEXT_AKTKMD105_04413_TODO_03<tab>Aid the wounded Qerasaf.
TEXT_AKTKMD105_04413_TODO_04<tab>Survey the area.
TEXT_AKTKMD105_04413_TODO_05<tab>Continue to survey the area.
TEXT_AKTKMD105_04413_TODO_06<tab>Continue to survey the area.
TEXT_AKTKMD105_04413_TODO_07<tab>Speak with Matsya.
TEXT_AKTKMD105_04413_ALISAIE_000_000<tab>His wounds are deep, but he may yet be saved. I will see to him─pray look after the others!
TEXT_AKTKMD105_04413_MATSYA_000_005<tab>When I last came here to sell my fish, everyone was so bright and cheerful. This is a nightmare...
TEXT_AKTKMD105_04413_YERUVVET_000_010<tab>The horror... I pray that the Sisters will see us through this calamity...
TEXT_AKTKMD105_04413_SYSTEM_000_015<tab>There is nothing you can do for this villager.
TEXT_AKTKMD105_04413_SYSTEM_000_020<tab>This villager has been dead for some time.
TEXT_AKTKMD105_04413_PALAKASMANC04412_000_025<tab>I...I am fine, thank you... Please...save the others...
TEXT_AKTKMD105_04413_SYSTEM_000_030<tab>This poor soul is beyond saving.
TEXT_AKTKMD105_04413_ALPHINAUD_000_040<tab>I can tend to the rest. Pray look after Matsya─no doubt what we have seen here weighs even heavier on his heart than ours.
TEXT_AKTKMD105_04413_ALPHINAUD_000_050<tab>Stay by Matsya's side, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. Unlike us, he is not accustomed to seeing such horrors...
TEXT_AKTKMD105_04413_MATSYA_000_060<tab>Oh, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>! <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>!
TEXT_AKTKMD105_04413_MATSYA_000_061<tab>This is Yeruvvet, the elder here. He is hurt, but─praise be to the Sisters─he still lives!
TEXT_AKTKMD105_04413_YERUVVET_000_062<tab>Young Matsya here has told me everything. I have not the words to express my gratitude for your aid.
TEXT_AKTKMD105_04413_YERUVVET_000_063<tab>When the heavens began to burn, we were afraid, but did our best to carry on as we always have done...
TEXT_AKTKMD105_04413_YERUVVET_000_064<tab>Until today, when those unholy beasts came pouring into our village, a flood of midnight and death...

TEXT_AKTKMD105_04413_YERUVVET_000_065<tab>There are no words to describe what followed. Men and women I have known since they were babes struck down by the creatures, only to rise again to join the murderous horde, in the guise of those same hideous fiends...
TEXT_AKTKMD105_04413_YERUVVET_000_066<tab>In the chaos, a handful of our villagers fled for their lives. I can only hope they have found their way to safety...
TEXT_AKTKMD105_04413_YERUVVET_000_067<tab>Matsya, do you perchance remember Qerasaf and Mehvan? The young couple who always bought your freshest catches...
TEXT_AKTKMD105_04413_MATSYA_000_068<tab>How could I forget, Elder? When I first came to peddle my wares─desperate to eke out a living─they showed me such kindness...
TEXT_AKTKMD105_04413_MATSYA_000_069<tab>Others shunned me as an outsider, as is their way. But Qerasaf and Mehvan bought my fish, and sung its praises. They turned my fortunes around!
TEXT_AKTKMD105_04413_YERUVVET_000_070<tab>Alas, I fear they are in terrible danger. I saw them running towards Agama Temple, one of those beasts in close pursuit.

TEXT_AKTKMD105_04413_YERUVVET_000_071<tab>They had their child─still but a tiny babe. To elude these fiends while caring for one so young is an impossible task, surely. I beg of you, go to their aid...
TEXT_AKTKMD105_04413_MATSYA_000_072<tab>I...I want to help them. Yet I am but a fisherman─I cannot face beasts on my own. Will you come with me?
TEXT_AKTKMD105_04413_MATSYA_000_073<tab>Oh, thank you! Agama Temple lies to the west of here. We must hurry!
TEXT_AKTKMD105_04413_ALISAIE_000_080<tab>Don't worry─Alphinaud and I will watch over the village until you return. Go and find Matsya's friends.
TEXT_AKTKMD105_04413_MATSYA_000_090<tab>The temple is just ahead...
TEXT_AKTKMD105_04413_MATSYA_000_091<tab>It was built by those who worship Saint Agama, but has sadly fallen into disrepair in recent years.
TEXT_AKTKMD105_04413_MATSYA_000_092<tab>If my friends made it this far, no doubt they are hiding somewhere amidst the ruins.
TEXT_AKTKMD105_04413_QERASAF_000_093<tab>(-???-)No, please! Stay ba─annngggh...gggaaah!
TEXT_AKTKMD105_04413_MATSYA_000_094<tab>That was Qerasaf! Oh, no─this is not good!
TEXT_AKTKMD105_04413_Q1_000_095<tab>What will you say?
TEXT_AKTKMD105_04413_A1_000_096<tab>I'll take a look.
TEXT_AKTKMD105_04413_A1_000_097<tab>Wait here.
TEXT_AKTKMD105_04413_MATSYA_000_098<tab>P-Please do! The cry came from the ruins. You must hurry!
TEXT_AKTKMD105_04413_MATSYA_000_099<tab>Y-Yes, I understand... The cry came from the ruins! You must hurry!
TEXT_AKTKMD105_04413_MATSYA_000_110<tab>That was Qerasaf's voice─I'm sure of it! Oh gods...gods have mercy...
TEXT_AKTKMD105_04413_BALLOON_000_120<tab>Aieeeeeeeeeghhh!
TEXT_AKTKMD105_04413_BALLOON_000_125<tab>Why...why...aaaaaaghhh...
TEXT_AKTKMD105_04413_SYSTEM_000_130<tab>The man lies motionless on the ground, bearing a grievous wound...
TEXT_AKTKMD105_04413_MATSYA_000_131<tab>I'm sorry, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. I tried to stay behind, but I couldn't...
TEXT_AKTKMD105_04413_MATSYA_000_132<tab>No...it cannot be!
TEXT_AKTKMD105_04413_QERASAF_000_133<tab>Is someone... Anyone...
TEXT_AKTKMD105_04413_QERASAF_000_134<tab>My arms...so heavy... And my legs... I cannot feel my legs...
TEXT_AKTKMD105_04413_QERASAF_000_135<tab>My wife...fled with our daughter...
TEXT_AKTKMD105_04413_QERASAF_000_136<tab>I need to find them...need to be with them...
TEXT_AKTKMD105_04413_QERASAF_000_137<tab>I need...
TEXT_AKTKMD105_04413_MATSYA_000_138<tab>Qerasaf! No, Qerasaf─you must stay strong!
TEXT_AKTKMD105_04413_QERASAF_000_139<tab>More time... I thought I had...
TEXT_AKTKMD105_04413_QERASAF_000_140<tab>I...I don't want to die...
TEXT_AKTKMD105_04413_Q2_000_141<tab>What will you do?
TEXT_AKTKMD105_04413_A2_000_142<tab>Speak to Qerasaf.
TEXT_AKTKMD105_04413_A2_000_143<tab>Dry Qerasaf's tears.
TEXT_AKTKMD105_04413_QERASAF_000_144<tab>Thank you...
TEXT_AKTKMD105_04413_QERASAF_000_145<tab>Please...find them...
TEXT_AKTKMD105_04413_MATSYA_000_146<tab>Mehvan still lives. And she has their child...
TEXT_AKTKMD105_04413_MATSYA_000_147<tab>We must search the jungle between here and Palaka's Stand. There is nowhere else she could have gone. I think...
TEXT_AKTKMD105_04413_MATSYA_000_148<tab>Forgive me, Qerasaf... Once we have saved your wife and child, we will return and lay you to rest...
TEXT_AKTKMD105_04413_SYSTEM_000_150<tab>You see no tracks or other signs of recent travel. Mehvan and the child must be elsewhere...
TEXT_AKTKMD105_04413_BALLOON_000_160<tab>Aaaaaaaaaaaaghhh!
TEXT_AKTKMD105_04413_BALLOON_000_165<tab>Urk... Urggggggggghhh...
TEXT_AKTKMD105_04413_SYSTEM_000_170<tab>If Mehvan and her daughter came through this area recently, you see no evidence of their passage...
TEXT_AKTKMD105_04413_ALPHINAUD_000_180<tab>...There. Your wounds have closed. Can you stand?
TEXT_AKTKMD105_04413_ALISAIE_000_185<tab>Just a moment, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. I'll be with you shortly.
TEXT_AKTKMD105_04413_MATSYA_000_190<tab>D-Did you see any sign of them? I found nothing!
TEXT_AKTKMD105_04413_MATSYA_000_191<tab>Perhaps the beasts have chased them farther from the village.
TEXT_AKTKMD105_04413_MATSYA_000_192<tab>Oh, gods above, I beseech you! Pray deliver Mehvan and her little one to safety...
